#!/usr/bin/fish

# getting offline, enjoy the fucking show???
# how about setting the lnclude variable?
# you know nothing about the fucking file? and what do you want then?

# your process should be making more sense, make the process easier to go.
command c "-I/usr/include/python2.7 main.c" &| cat
# do you accept new input from some brand new system?
